caption: The video narrates the first anniversary of the protagonists, but before the celebration, one of them discovers a secret about Mary and decides to expose it, causing a conflict between them. Key points include the discovery of a secret about Mary, the decision to expose this secret, the reluctance of the other to listen to the revelation, the ensuing conflict between them, the display of unstable emotions, the appearance of the latter's father in the video, existing discord between the father and Mary, the eventual decision of the protagonists to continue working together, the admiration expressed by one towards the other, and the decision of the latter to forgive the former.
